content:
I don't have access to real-time information or current deadlines. however, i can give you an idea about how the funding opportunities usually work:

the rse offers funding opportunities throughout the year, and the application deadlines vary depending on the scheme. you can find the application deadlines for each funding scheme on the rse website. the application process can be quite competitive, and it's usually a good idea to apply well in advance of the deadline. it's also essential to carefully read the guidelines and eligibility requirements before applying.

additionally, the rse provides workshops and training to help researchers prepare their applications to improve their chances of success. you can find more information about these workshops on the rse website as well.
